name: Razor
body:
### Razor UO Assistant Tool
Razor requires .NET Framework 4.0 to be available. Most users already have this installed. It can be obtained here if necessary: http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17851

Razor is not supported on operating systems older than Windows XP.

The latest Razor releases can be found at https://github.com/msturgill/razor/releases
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
